channel.title: Disconnection as soon as log in
channel.description:
ok, so i decded to make a server..
I have changed alot of things and deleted all npcs etc. Now, though when i log in it says player already logged in, then i click login again and it comes on, says "welcome to (myserver)" and the ither welcome msgs....
Then it says loading - please wait. I't now does not change untill i exit the moparscape client.
Here is what "runserver.bat" Says for all this......
[code](myservername) ------------------------------------------------------- Loading npcs... drops... spawn list...done! Connection from localhost:1065 [client-1-admin]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 63 ms] ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (localhost) Connection from localhost:1066 [client-1-admin]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 0 ms] ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (localhost) Connection from localhost:1067 [client-1-admin]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 0 ms] Client lost connection: timeout [client-1-admin]: Logout ClientHandler: Client admin disconnected (localhost)[/code]
How would i prevent this from happening? Is this because the player has turned null?
Please answer asap so i can continue with my server.

item.title: Disconnection as soon as log in
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

my name was not admin, it was infact sanchy.

i just put admin on the thread for example…

I think the source is devolution.

Do i just make the players type ::backup when they log in, or…another solution??

pm back A.S.A.P. please!

Read full topic
item.source: Disconnection as soon as log in

item.title: Disconnection as soon as log in
item.dc:creator: @_Saint + Saint +
item.description:
@_Saint wrote:

iits because your name is admin
try username

koz

then tell me what happens

Read full topic
item.source: Disconnection as soon as log in

item.title: Disconnection as soon as log in
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

[myservername] = devolution lol.
Um, you probally put a space in a cfg file. Its not saying anything, but its all the same effects. With the Loading Screen and what not. What ever CFG file you edited, go to it, hit Control + f, and in the box, put a space. Then search threw. Its going to take a while, becuase its laid out like

spawn = 4924

With the 2 spaces there, but before and after the = sign should be the only spaces.

Read full topic
item.source: Disconnection as soon as log in

item.description:
@system wrote:

ok, so i decded to make a server…

I have changed alot of things and deleted all npcs etc.
Now, though when i log in it says player already logged in, then i click login again and it comes on, says “welcome to (myserver)” and the ither welcome msgs…

Then it says loading - please wait.
I’t now does not change untill i exit the moparscape client.

code

Loading npcs… drops… spawn list…done!
Connection from localhost:1065
[client-1-admin]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 63 ms]
